AI chat: Fixed request timeouts and improved response accuracy for better user experience. I'll be actively reviewing user questions and progressively improving the AI's answers so it better understands and applies VTES rules.

Launched NEW AI chat feature, allowing users to ask questions about VTES rules, card interactions, and rulings directly within the app.

Reminder: For complex or specific interactions, even official rulings may require interpretation based on the current tournament environment. You should always ask an official VTES judge to confirm the ruling for competitive play.
